content: this easy crochet washcloth uses the popular lemon peel stitch also known as the pebble stitch and starts with a mitered square the border rounds include corner spaces for hanging the washcloth on a shower organizer this pattern is part of the dishcloth of the month crochet along with oombawka design crochet 1 and the stitchin mommy 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting flat in row increasing crocheting in the round for edging and border border crocheting around the side of your project includes video tutorial includes video tutorial for lemon peel stitch pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** washcloth 10 5 26 5 cm square **materials** circulo inlove slim 4 yarn 100% cotton 3 5 oz/100 g 182 yd/167 m 1 skein in 5556 tiffany *or approximately 130 yd 119 m in any 100% cotton light weight yarn* us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* stitch markers - 4 yarn needle **gauge** through row 28 = 8 5 21 5 cm square in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this project* 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/dishcloth-of-the-month-crochet-along/ 2 https //www thestitchinmommy com/dishcloth-of-the-month-crochet-along/ 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/09/14/crochet-easy-scrub-washcloth-pattern/ 4 https //amzn to/3k10fuw
